description: Returns a list of resource metadata for a given list of trigger names. After calling the ListTriggers operation, you can call this operation to access the data to which you have been granted permissions. This operation supports all IAM permissions, including permission conditions that uses tags.

nested_items.name: Triggers
nested_items.description: A list of trigger definitions.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the trigger.

nested_items.name: WorkflowName
nested_items.description: The name of the workflow associated with the trigger.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: Reserved for future use.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of trigger that this is.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the trigger.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of this trigger.

nested_items.name: Schedule
nested_items.description: A cron expression used to specify the schedule (see Time-Based Schedules for Jobs and Crawlers. For example, to run something every day at 12:15 UTC, you would specify: cron(15 12 * * ? *).

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: The actions initiated by this trigger.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The name of a job to be run.

nested_items.name: Arguments
nested_items.description: The job arguments used when this trigger fires. For this job run, they replace the default arguments set in the job definition itself.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Timeout
nested_items.description: The JobRun timeout in minutes. This is the maximum time that a job run can consume resources before it is terminated and enters TIMEOUT status. This overrides the timeout value set in the parent job.

nested_items.name: SecurityConfiguration
nested_items.description: The name of the SecurityConfiguration structure to be used with this action.

nested_items.name: NotificationProperty
nested_items.description: Specifies configuration properties of a job run notification.

nested_items.name: NotifyDelayAfter
nested_items.description: After a job run starts, the number of minutes to wait before sending a job run delay notification.

nested_items.name: CrawlerName
nested_items.description: The name of the crawler to be used with this action.

nested_items.name: Predicate
nested_items.description: The predicate of this trigger, which defines when it will fire.

nested_items.name: Logical
nested_items.description: An optional field if only one condition is listed. If multiple conditions are listed, then this field is required.

nested_items.name: Conditions
nested_items.description: A list of the conditions that determine when the trigger will fire.

nested_items.name: LogicalOperator
nested_items.description: A logical operator.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The name of the job whose JobRuns this condition applies to, and on which this trigger waits.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The condition state. Currently, the only job states that a trigger can listen for are SUCCEEDED, STOPPED, FAILED, and TIMEOUT. The only crawler states that a trigger can listen for are SUCCEEDED, FAILED, and CANCELLED.

nested_items.name: CrawlerName
nested_items.description: The name of the crawler to which this condition applies.

nested_items.name: CrawlState
nested_items.description: The state of the crawler to which this condition applies.

nested_items.name: EventBatchingCondition
nested_items.description: Batch condition that must be met (specified number of events received or batch time window expired) before EventBridge event trigger fires.

nested_items.name: BatchSize
nested_items.description: Number of events that must be received from Amazon EventBridge before EventBridge event trigger fires.

nested_items.name: BatchWindow
nested_items.description: Window of time in seconds after which EventBridge event trigger fires. Window starts when first event is received.

nested_items.name: TriggersNotFound
nested_items.description: A list of names of triggers not found.
(string) ---
